description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called RoomDetailsScreen, which displays detailed information about a specific room, including availability, price, description, and a button to proceed with booking.

classes.name: RoomDetailsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that shows detailed information about a room and provides a call-to-action button to start the booking process.

methods.name: RoomDetailsScreen
methods.description: Constructor for RoomDetailsScreen widget, accepts an optional Room object to display details.

methods.name: _goToBooking
methods.description: Private method that navigates to the booking creation route with the current room as argument when invoked.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that constructs the widget tree for displaying the room details or an error message if no room data is provided.
